Message: It's important to prioritize your well-being, but perhaps we can try a gentler exercise routine or focus more on stretching today. Let me know how you're emotionally, so I can adapt my support.
I don't want to train with you!
I understand your feelings right now might make practicing difficult. Take the time you need, but remember I'm here when you're ready to return with renewed energy.
I want to hang out with my friends.

Enjoying social connections is essential too. Come back refreshed, and we'll pick up where we left off, focusing on the progress you've already made. Your fitness journey waits patiently for your return.
